short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock rewards directly within the Twitter (X) platform by engaging with tweets to discover treasure with $MECH tokens and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock rewards directly within the Twitter (X) platform by engaging with tweets to discover treasure chests filled with $MECH tokens and more. 

This innovative extension transforms every interaction into an opportunity to earn, making your social media experience more rewarding.
